moves.1. e4: This game is not vary long but the reason I like it is that the ratings are very different and I was the underdog
moves.1... e5 2. d3 Nf6 3. Bg5 Bc5: this move is very aggressive and it could be dangerous for him
moves.4. Bxf6: this is a wrong move because it allows mass development for me> and could prove a very lethal attack for me
moves.4... Qxf6 5. f3: this is not a very strong move but not bad
moves.5... Qb6 6. b3: here is where he goes wrong and lets my bishop in to a very weak spot!
moves.7. Kd2 Qe3+: this attack is going to prove to be very fruit full for me and will allow me to get his queen if played write
moves.8. Kc3 Qd4+ 9. Kd2 Qxa1: here I go for the rook and point advantage
moves.10. Kc1: BIG MASTAK!!!! this allows me to win his queen do you know how in one move
moves.10... Be3+ 11. Qd2 Bxd2+: after this he resined and I won and this boosted my rating since he was in the 1200 after many games
